# Ignore system files and directories
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
*.log
*.tmp

# Ignore Node.js dependencies
node_modules/

# Ignore build directories
dist/
build/

# Ignore IDE and editor configuration files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp

# Ignore OS-generated files
.DS_Store
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
*.un~
*.sublime-workspace

# Ignore user-specific files
*.bak
*.swp
*.swo
*.swn
*.tmp
*.log

# Ignore Windows files
*.lnk
ntuser.dat
ntuser.ini
Desktop.ini

# Ignore personal directories and files
3D Objects/
Contacts/
Desktop/
Documents/
Downloads/
Favorites/
Links/
Music/
OneDrive/
Pictures/
Saved Games/
Searches/
Videos/
NTUSER.DAT*
._netrc

# Ignore other specific files and directories
.cache/
.cursor/
.gitconfig
.lesshst
.redhat/
IntelGraphicsProfiles/
MicrosoftEdgeBackups/
AppData/
backend/
battery-report.html
clinic-management-system/
clinic-management/
